title: Fire
brief_description: Animated impressionistic film portraying an idyllic forest alive with plants and animals that suddenly grows quiet as ominous clouds of black smoke roll over the landscape, and fire consumes everything in its path.
description: Animated impressionistic film portraying an idyllic forest alive with plants and animals that suddenly grows quiet as ominous clouds of black smoke roll over the landscape, and fire consumes everything in its path.
